		                    Metastatic Osteosarcoma and Malignant Fibrous Histiocytoma of Bone
		                    Lung Metastasis    When osteosarcoma or malignant fibrous histiocytoma (MFH) spreads, it usually spreads to the lung. Treatment of osteosarcoma and MFH with lung metastasis may include the following:         -  Combination chemotherapy followed by surgery to remove the primary cancer and
